subject: Paralympic Games
Chicago Marathon
Disabilities
Marathon Running
Spina Bifida
lead_paragraph: Tatyana McFadden is training for the Chicago Marathon, where she will try to become the first person — able-bodied or disabled — to win three major marathons in one year.
snippet: Tatyana McFadden is training for the Chicago Marathon, where she will try to become the first person — able-bodied or disabled — to win three major marathons in one year.
